short_summary: Business consultation and SAP training for the Department of Defense
description: Business process consulting services for a Senior SAP Training Business Consultant at the Department of National Defense. The project involves optimization of financial process transformation, as well as changes to the Defense Resources Management Information System (DRMIS) complex implementation of SAP. The consultant will provide strategic guidance and training to the department's stakeholders and business analysis teams within the Defence Financial Systems Integration (DFSIl Division,
